title: Pixel 5 Wifi Calling not working/unreliable
content:
Since purchasing my Pixel 5 the network reception at my home is terrible and unreliable. My network Wifi calling enabled for the Pixel 5 and occasionally it shows up in the top taskbar as wifi calling (but not for long) but I am never able to make or receive calls.
I have been in contact with my network providier for the past few weeks trying to problem solve this but they now say it must be a fault with the phone from the checks they have done (iDMobile). 
The network reception is poor and the ability to use Wifi calling is a must, my Pixel 2 was great at this but the Pixel 5 seems to have this issue from alot of people, Anyone else experiencing this please?
